name: soccer ball
descripton: Ball that is used for kicking in a game of soccer

name: football
descripton: ball that is thrown and passed around in football

name: hockey stick
descripton: stick used in hockey to move puck around

name: disc
descripton: disc that is thrown around in frisbee

name: basketball
descripton: a thick ball that is bounced, passed and thrown in basketball

name: baseball
descripton: the ball that is caught and hit in the sport of baseball

name: snowboard
descripton: The board that the athlete uses to slide around in the snow in snowboarding

name: harness
descripton: the vest that a rock-climber wears to attach himself to safety wire when rock-climbing

name: skates
descripton: The "boots" that a skater wears that have blades on the bottom, that lets the skater glide on the ice
